title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing 'Ok' after setting the output location and classpath, an error message appears: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This occurs because setting the output location and classpath are treated as two separate operations, which creates an illegal state.
EB: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be offered as one operation. Similar to the validation process, the setting of the classpath and output location should be combined into a single action. Additionally, the error message should be improved to say: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
